songs.lyrics:
[Refrain]
London calling, speak the slang now
Boys say "wha', gwan", girls say "wha', wha'"
London calling, speak the slang now
Boys say "wha', gwan", girls say "wha', wha'"

[Chorus]
(Ya ya hey!) Slam
Galang, galang, gala
(Ya ya hey!) Shotgun, get down
Get down, get down, get down
(Ya ya hey!) Slam
Galang, galang, gala
(Oh aye oh aye oh!) Too late you down
Dun-dun-da-dun-da-dun

[Verse 1]
Who the hell is hounding you in the BMW?
How the hell he find you? 147'd you
The feds gon' get you, pull the strings on the hood
One paranoid youth blazin' through the hood

[Hook]
Blaze a blaze, galang-a-lang-a-lang-lang
Purple haze, galang-a-lang-a-lang-lang
Blaze a blaze, galang-a-lang-a-lang-lang
Purple haze, galang-a-lang-a-lang-lang

[Chorus]
(Ya ya hey!) Slam
Galang, galang, gala
(Ya ya hey!) Shotgun, get down
Get down, get down, get down
(Ya ya hey!) Slam
Galang, galang, gala
(Oh aye oh aye oh!) Too late you down
Dun-dun-da-dun-da-dun

[Refrain]
London calling, speak the slang now
Boys say "wha', gwan", girls say "wha', wha'"
London calling, speak the slang now
Boys say "wha', gwan", girls say "wha', wha'"

[Verse 2]
They say
Rivers gonna run though, work is gonna save you
Pray and you will pull through, suck a dick'll help you
Don't let 'em get to you, if he's got one you get two
Backstab your crew

[Hook]
Blaze a blaze, galang-a-lang-a-lang-lang
Purple haze, galang-a-lang-a-lang-lang
Blaze a blaze, galang-a-lang-a-lang-lang
Purple haze, galang-a-lang-a-lang-lang

[Chorus]
(Ya ya hey!) Slam
Galang, galang, gala
(Ya ya hey!) Shotgun, get down
Get down, get down, get down
(Ya ya hey!) Slam
Galang, galang, gala
(Oh aye oh aye oh!) Too late you down
Dun-dun-da-dun-da-dun

[Hook]
Blaze a blaze, galang-a-lang-a-lang-lang
Purple haze, galang-a-lang-a-lang-lang
Blaze a blaze, galang-a-lang-a-lang-lang
Purple haze, galang-a-lang-a-lang-lang

[Bridge]
Ooh, Galang, galang, gala
Slam, Galang, galang, gala
Ooh, Shotgun, get down
Get down, get down, get down
Ooh, Galang, galang, gala
Blaze a blaze
Ta-na-ta-na-ta-na, tah-ne-tah-ne-tah
Ooh, Galang, galang, gala (Too late, you down)
Ta-na-ta-na-ta-na, tah-ne-tah-ne-tah
Ooh, Galang, galang, gala
Blaze a blaze
Ta-na-ta-na-ta-na, tah-ne-tah-ne-tah
Ooh, Galang, galang, gala (Too late, you down)
Ta-na-ta-na-ta-na, tah-ne-tah-ne-tah
Ooh

[Chorus]
(Ya ya hey!) Slam
Galang, galang, gala
(Ya ya hey!) Shotgun, get down
Get down, get down, get down
(Ya ya hey!) Slam
Galang, galang, gala
(Oh aye oh aye oh!) Too late you down
Dun-dun-da-dun-da-dun
(Ya ya hey!) Slam
Galang, galang, gala
(Ya ya hey!) Shotgun, get down
Get down, get down, get down
(Ya ya hey!) Slam
Galang, galang, gala
(Oh aye oh aye oh!) Too late you down
Dun-dun-da-dun-da-dun

[Outro]
(Ya ya hey!) Go ahead, L-London
(Ya ya hey!) Go ahead, L-London
(Ya ya hey!) Go ahead, L-London
(Oh aye oh aye oh!) Go ahead, L-London
(Ya ya hey!) Go ahead, L-London
(Ya ya hey!) Go ahead, L-London
(Ya ya hey!) Go ahead, L-London
(Oh aye oh aye oh!) Too late you down
Dun-dun-da-dun-da-dun
Go ahead, L-London
songs.title: Galang (South Rakkas Remix)
